name: Trove of the Traveller
description:
NOTE: Please leave the instant movement setting on, as there seems to be a bug with movement that only occurs when it's off.

Traverse the dungeon and project your spirit out of your body to solve its secrets.

Controls

WASD to move, Q/E to turn. You can also play with the arrow keys or numpad.

Press Tab to open/close your notes. Check them out if you need a hint on how to proceed.

Sorry about not being able to see your physical body and the lack of sound! Both will be added after the jam.

Attributions

Dungeon Remastered Pack by Kay Lousberg

Dungeon Asset Pack 1 by Blackcat Designs
